#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
{
	if(b==0)
	 return(a);
	 else
	 return(gcd(b,a%b));
}


int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long n;
		cin>>n;
		long long count=0;
		for(long long i=1;i<=n-2;i++)
		{ 
		   if(i%2!=0)
 			count=count+i;
 		
		}
		printf("%lld\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
